frontmatter.title: Fourier & Hartley Transforms: Principles and Applications
frontmatter.description: Exploring the mathematical foundations of Fourier and Hartley transforms, including the Fourier Slice Theorem, and their application to my work in structural biology at InstaDeep.

frontmatter.title: Quaternions and Spatial Rotation: Principles and Applications
frontmatter.description: Exploring the mathematical foundations of quaternions and their role in spatial rotation, with direct applications to my work at InstaDeep on modeling molecular poses.
